features: Dimension: 21.26 x 13.39 inch/L x W. Compatible with iMac 24 inch;compatible with Lenovo Ideacentre 23.8;compatible with HP Pavilion 24/Flagship 23.8;compatible with Inspiron 23.8,compatible with Dell P Series 24;compatible with Fast Elite 8300 FHD 23;compatible with Sceptre 24;compatible with Acer Aspire 23.8/XFA240 bmjdpr 24;compatible with ViewSonic 24 and diagonally measured 23,23.6,23.8,24 inch 16:9 widescreen desktop PC LED monitor. Please measure your modiagonal dimension before purchase.

Protects your eyes by filtering and curbing 99% harmful UV. Anti-blue light between 420nm - 460nm can be reduced by 45% for HEV protection. Effectively reduce eye strain and fatigue caused by the UV and blue light.
Made of Acrylic. It can effectively prevent screen from dust, fingerprint and scratches. Suitable for office / home OL, gamer and programmer.
Ultra thin to 0.01 inch of 95% clear transparency, which will not darken your laptop screen, keeping the original screen brightness.
Easy to install, just remove the surface film on each side and hang on the monitor screen. 1 year warranty on every screen protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have two big monitors I work on for10 hours a day and my eyes have been suffering from blue screen glare. Sometimes it's like I looked at the sun for a second. These screen protectors fit right over top of my monitors. I didn't want a sticky screen because the monitors are the property of my work and I may have to return them at some point. These blue light glare protectors are a little long, but they work great! The clarity is glass like and the blue light glare is dramatically reduced. My eyes thank you. I highly recommend these! I got three in total. Two for the big screens and one for my laptop. All of them are a tad long and a tiny bit short on the sides, but the quality is very impressive. It's like I got new monitors that don't hurt my eyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good to go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helpful but with a slight glare.
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these blue light protectors for my 27-inch monitors. For the one I have permanently turned to portrait mode (see photo) I used a couple of Velcro strips to keep the screen protector in place. They’re a big help to my vision and really protect your eyes well but there is some glare. To get rid of the worse of it I partially covered the light over my desk with a piece of copier paper. I think the blue light protectors are a good buy for the price but be ready to deal with potential glare. They’re a bit bigger than the screen but others I looked at were too small by a slight bit. Refer to the measurements table to see how the protectors would fit on your monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product! I would buy it again!
reviews.reviewText: I love these. I bought two for my screens at work. I love how easy they are to install. You take off the film and put these on your monitor. Done. I was worried that they would make the screen too dark, but they didn't at all. I would buy them over again. Worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Truly does block harmful Rays!
reviews.reviewText: It arrived on time, and packaged great! It was in a box, packed firmly with styrofoam, and since both sides of the piece had a removable film on it, I knew it would not be scratched...I don't know why others are complaining of the shield being scratched, I wonder if they read the INSTRUCTIONS to peel the film off BOTH sides prior to installation?! Anyway, prior to using this shield, I bought a new monitor in May, and somehow after working on it for hours a day, I'd walk away from the computer and see a 'gray spot' in my right eye for hours afterwards...It only started after I received the new monitor....my old one I didnt have any problems with...well, I thought to myself 'I have got to get some kind of shield for my eyes', and after reading the reviews on this particular item, I decided to take the plunge $. It IS well worth it! No more Grey spot!! Eyes are no longer tired, nor do they grow blurry from using this! Reading is as crisp as ever...It adds a teensy bit of gray, but that is ok....its keeping my eyes healthy !! Get off the fence and take the plunge! You only have one set of eyes that cannot be replaced....do it for your health! xoxo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I get headaches from being on the computer all day for school and this was the perfect solution. It fits my 21” Mac perfectly. I added another monitor to my computer so I had to buy another one of these. It’s well made and it just sits on top. The best thing is that it saves my eyes and helps a lot with my headaches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I RECOMMEND IT HELPS TO AVOID EYE RESTRAINS!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It fit perfectly over my desktop and I could immediately see the difference. I'm very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewerName: DAVID A CUEVAS GARCIADAVID A CUEVAS GARCIA
reviews.reviewText: Me parece un excelente producto y cumple a la perfección lo que promete. He tenido que trabajar por muchas horas frente a la computadora y con este producto mis ojos descansan mucho.En mi caso lo compré para una iMac viejita, la pantalla es un poco más gruesa y no encaja bien el producto (ver fotografías), pero lo solucioné con una “mexicanada” (cinta adhesiva), porque no quería devolver el producto ya que me pareció excelente.Lo evalúo con 5 estrellas por el que producto es excelente, solamente sugiero revisar el grosor de la pantalla para la que lo van a utilizar.

reviews.reviewTitle: My good choice. A wonderful thing for my eyes!
reviews.reviewText: My good choice. A wonderful thing for my eyes!It is really reducing the blue light or the radiation of the coputer. I have been feeling much better when I work for a long time on the screen.I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: It really has reduced the glare from my monitor screen.
reviews.reviewText: So simple to fit after removing the protective film from both sides. It's angled to sit on the top of the monitor - might be a problem if you have a built in camera. Yes it is reflective but it doesn't bother me too much. I an enjoying my eyes not getting sore, dry and tired.
I got Screen Protector for LG 27UP650P-W monitor. The Protector does make sense. Pleasant for eyes.
